item.description:
Planning for upcoming speakers and events.
Library and community outreach; local multilingual education; sponsorships, etc.

Even better food and wine than usual, thanks to our kind friends down the street. Plan ahead so you can come.

Meeting at the entrance to Border Cafe, for simplicity. (I tried to add a Meetup location for this event, to meet in Harvard Yard, but it didn't work :( )

phone number to reach us : 617 596 X 4184

For more information, see http://en.wikipedia.o...
item.name: Wikimagic planning meeting
